RelatedSentence: Town officials joined Wayne Estes of the Department of Fire Programs and several citizens to dedicate the facility which will be used for training fire fighters .
Town officials joined Wayne Estes of the Department of Fire Programs and several citizens to dedicate the facility which will be used for training fire fighters .
The town took the lead in building the facility with the bulk of the funding coming from them and the fire services program .
The town owned the property was involved in the project from day one .
They presented plaques of appreciation to the Mayor , Estes and to Danny Brown who oversaw the project .
They presented plaques of appreciation to the Mayor , Estes and to Danny Brown who oversaw the project .
Keith said Brown came to the site when the building was in the planning stages and was there every day overseeing construction .
They also have plaques for the board of supervisors , town of Bluefield , Noah Horn well drilling , Consol and other companies .
Keith said the town of Bluefield made a $ 5,000 donation to the building .
Consol installed a device that can simulate a gas leak causing a fire .

The building is used for training and simulates smoke and heat a firefighter would come in contact with .
Estes said the town should be proud of the building which can be used by any department in the area for practice .

It is also available for classes and a firefighter one class used it during the winter .
We were out here every weekend whether it was 12 degrees or 50 degrees , ' Keith said .
After a luncheon prepared by EMS workers tours of the building were offered .
The town received a grant of $ 430,000 from the state to pay for the $ 500,000 building and used other donations and town money to complete it .
